name: Design Research Reconciliation
description: Validates that the design system is thematically authentic, has no cross-essay collisions, and CSS implements the design research

validations.description: DESIGN-RESEARCH.md must still exist and be reconciled
Design research must not contain [UNRECONCILED] marker

notes: G4.1 is a reconciliation gate. The Design Research Reconciliation Agent verifies thematic authenticity, cross-essay novelty, and that CSS custom properties can implement the design research. It may annotate DESIGN-RESEARCH.md with [RECONCILED] or flag issues.
